responsibilities: Contributing to a real-world web application, 'Gradding: Study Abroad Made Simple', as part of a 15+ member development team.
Responsible for fixing bugs and implementing new features using Next.js for frontend development and NestJS (Node.js framework backend services.

Actively learning and applying full-stack best practices, including RESTful API design, modular backend architecture, and server-side rendering with Next.js, to deliver scalable and maintainable solutions.

educations.institution: Central Academy Ambamata Sr. Sec. School
Central Academy Ambamata Sr. Sec. School

funds-website.title: Funds Website
funds-website.skill: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js, Redux
funds-website.overview: Association Funds is a dynamic and user-friendly web application built using the MERN stack, designed to streamline the financial management of groups or associations. It facilitates efficient tracking of group balances, individual savings, loan management, and membership records, catering to various user roles with specific permissions. The platform is built with a focus on speed, simplicity, and security, ensuring seamless financial administration for groups of any size

list.title: Super Admin :
list.description: Complete control with the ability to create, read, update, and delete records for all members.

list.title: Admin :
list.description: Can create, read, and update records but lacks the authority to delete.

list.title: Member :
list.description: Can view their own details, including savings, loan information, and group balance.
Track monthly savings of each member and the total group balance.
Process loan requests from members and update loan details in real-time.
Manage loan installments and maintain a clear repayment record.
Handle member exits efficiently by deleting their records (Super Admin only).

Tech Stack.title: Frontend:
Tech Stack.description: ReactJS, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap for an intuitive and responsive UI.

Tech Stack.title: Backend:
Tech Stack.description: Node.js and Express.js for fast and secure API handling.

Tech Stack.title: Database:
Tech Stack.description: MongoDB for robust and scalable data storage.

Tech Stack.title: State Management:
Tech Stack.description: Redux for efficient application state handling.

How It Works.title: Savings Tracking:
How It Works.description: Each member contributes a fixed savings amount every month, updated by the admin on the platform.

How It Works.title: Loan Management:
How It Works.description: Members can request loans, and admins handle approvals while maintaining a transparent loan record, including installments.

How It Works.title: Data Accessibility:
How It Works.description: Members can view their own financial details, while admins and super admins have broader visibility and management capabilities.

How It Works.title: Group Insights:
How It Works.description: The platform provides a clear view of the total group savings, ensuring transparency for all members.

Why Choose Association Funds?.title: Effortless Financial Oversight:
Why Choose Association Funds?.description: Simplifies the management of group finances, eliminating manual errors.

Why Choose Association Funds?.title: User-Friendly Interface:
Why Choose Association Funds?.description: Designed for users with minimal technical knowledge to navigate easily.

Why Choose Association Funds?.title: Secure and Scalable:
Why Choose Association Funds?.description: Built on a robust technology stack to ensure data security and future scalability.

Why Choose Association Funds?.title: Customizable Roles:
Why Choose Association Funds?.description: Assign appropriate permissions to users, ensuring accountability and proper access.

Use Cases.description: Family or friends' group savings initiatives

Get Your Own Customized Version.description: Association Funds is not just a standalone solution—it’s an opportunity to have a personalized financial management platform tailored to your group’s unique needs. The website is available for sale, and buyers can request customized features and preferences to match their specific requirements. Transform the way your group manages finances with a tailored solution just for you!

portfolio-website.title: My Portfolio
portfolio-website.skill: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Next.js, TailwindCSS, GSAP
portfolio-website.overview: My Portfolio Website is a well-crafted and fully responsive personal portfolio designed to showcase my skills, experience, and projects in an engaging way. Built with modern technologies, it dynamically renders content from a JSON file, ensuring easy updates and flexibility. The site features smooth animations, a clean UI, and an intuitive layout to provide visitors with a seamless browsing experience.

Key Features.title: Dynamic Content Rendering:
Key Features.description: All information (education, skills, projects, etc.) is fetched from a JSON file, making updates effortless.

Key Features.title: Smooth Animations:
Key Features.description: Powered by GSAP, enhancing the user experience with elegant transitions and effects.

Key Features.title: Fully Responsive Design:
Key Features.description: Built with TailwindCSS, ensuring a seamless experience across all devices.

Key Features.title: Comprehensive Information:
Key Features.description: Includes sections for About Me, Skills, Education, Projects, Work Availability, and Social Links.

Key Features.title: Modern & Fast:
Key Features.description: Developed using Next.js for optimized performance and efficient rendering.

Tech Stack.title: Frontend:
Tech Stack.description: Next.js, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TailwindCSS for a modern and responsive UI.

Tech Stack.title: Animations:
Tech Stack.description: GSAP for smooth and visually appealing effects.

Tech Stack.title: Data Handling:
Tech Stack.description: JSON file for dynamic content updates.

blog-website.title: Blog Website
blog-website.skill: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TailwindCSS, React.js, Redux, Appwrite (BAAS)
blog-website.overview: The Blog Website is a sleek and interactive platform for sharing ideas, exploring posts, and creating well-formatted blogs. With a focus on simplicity and functionality, it allows users to seamlessly connect and share content with a global audience

Key Features.title: User Authentication:
Key Features.description: Signup and login using email and password for secure access.

Key Features.title: Content Creation:
Key Features.description: Create rich, formatted posts with the integrated TinyMCE text editor, including the option to insert images for engaging content.

Key Features.title: Community Interaction:
Key Features.description: Browse, read, and explore posts shared by other users.

Tech Stack.title: Frontend:
Tech Stack.description: React, HTML, CSS, TailwindCSS, and JavaScript for a responsive and visually appealing interface.

Tech Stack.title: Backend:
Tech Stack.description: Powered by Appwrite Services for secure and efficient backend-as-a-service (BaaS) integration.

todo-website.title: To-Do Website
todo-website.overview: The To-Do Website is a simple yet powerful task management platform designed to help users stay organized and productive. With an intuitive interface and seamless functionality, it enables users to create, update, and track their daily tasks efficiently.

Key Features.title: Task Management:
Key Features.description: Add, update, and delete tasks effortlessly to keep your to-do list up to date.

Key Features.title: Progress Tracking:
Key Features.description: Mark tasks as completed and monitor your productivity.

Key Features.title: User-Friendly Interface:
Key Features.description: Clean design built with Bootstrap for a responsive and easy-to-navigate experience.

Tech Stack.title: Frontend:
Tech Stack.description: React, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript for a dynamic and interactive user interface.

Tech Stack.title: Backend:
Tech Stack.description: Node.js and Express.js for robust API handling.

Tech Stack.title: Database:
Tech Stack.description: MongoDB for secure and scalable task storage.

simon-game.title: Simon Game
simon-game.overview: The Simon Game is a fun and challenging memory game designed to test your recall and focus. With an engaging interface, the game provides real-time tracking of your progress, showing the current stage and highest score simultaneously on the screen as you play

Key Features.title: Real-Time Stage Display:
Key Features.description: Always know your current stage as you progress.

Key Features.title: High Score Tracker:
Key Features.description: Your highest score is displayed live, motivating you to beat your personal best.

Key Features.title: Interactive Gameplay:
Key Features.description: Smooth, colorful animations and responsive controls for an enjoyable experience.

Key Features.title: Dynamic Interface:
Key Features.description: Built with jQuery, ensuring smooth interactivity and animations.

Key Features.title: Immersive Audio Feedback:
Key Features.description: Every color press is accompanied by a click sound, adding a tactile feel to gameplay.

Tech Stack.title: Frontend:
Tech Stack.description: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, and jQuery for a visually appealing and interactive interface.

How to Play.description: Start the game, and the screen will display a sequence of colors that light up one by one
Memorize the sequence and repeat it by clicking the corresponding colored buttons.
As you progress, the sequences grow longer and more challenging.
The current stage and highest score are displayed in real-time at the top of the screen, keeping you updated throughout the game.
The game ends when you make a mistake, and you can restart to try again.

dice-game.title: Dice Game
dice-game.overview: The Dice Game is a simple, browser-based two-player game where players compete by rolling dice to achieve the highest score. With vibrant visuals and smooth animations, it’s a quick and enjoyable way to challenge friends and have fun.

Key Features.title: Two-Player Gameplay:
Key Features.description: Designed for friendly competition between two players.

Key Features.title: Dual Dice Rolls:
Key Features.description: Each player rolls two dice simultaneously for added excitement.

Key Features.title: Randomized Outcomes:
Key Features.description: : Uses JavaScript to generate random numbers for fair results.

Key Features.title: Winner Announcement:
Key Features.description: Instantly determines and displays the winner after each roll.

Tech Stack.title: Frontend:
Tech Stack.description: HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript, and jQuery for a responsive and interactive interface.

How to Play.description: Both players get ready to roll their dice.
Click the Roll Dice button to roll two dice for each player.
The dice will display random numbers between 1 and 6.
The player with the higher combined score wins the round. If both scores are equal, it’s a draw!
Roll again for endless fun and competition.
